languages.text: "В случае крайней опасности для Ее Светлости мы уполномочены совершить подрыв купола данного сектора. Он вызовет взрывную декомпрессию. Покушающиеся лица погибнут при разгерметизации, Ее Светлость будет защищена полем своего трона. Прошу не предпринимать шагов, которые будут расценены как агрессия".

"If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."
languages.original_text: "В случае крайней опасности для Ее Светлости мы уполномочены совершить подрыв купола данного сектора. Он вызовет взрывную декомпрессию. Покушающиеся лица погибнут при разгерметизации, Ее Светлость будет защищена полем своего трона. Прошу не предпринимать шагов, которые будут расценены как агрессия".

traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: “如果库尔达女士的生命受到严重威胁，我们有权引爆整片区域。这样会引发爆炸性减压，所有攻击者都会在减压过程中丧命，而库尔达女士会受到宝座的偏折力场保护，不会受到任何影响。我建议你不要采取过激行为，以免我们将其认定为侵略行径。”
languages.original_text: "If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."

traits.locale_text: “如果库尔达女士的生命受到严重威胁，我们有权引爆整片区域。这样会引发爆炸性减压，所有攻击者都会在减压过程中丧命，而库尔达女士会受到宝座的偏折力场保护，不会受到任何影响。我建议你不要采取过激行为，以免我们将其认定为侵略行径。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: 「もしチョーダ様が危ない状況に陥った場合、この区域のドームを爆発させる権限が与えられています。そうなれば、爆発による減圧が起きる。攻撃者は減圧中に破壊されますが、チョーダ様は王座のフィールドで守られるでしょう。攻撃行為と解釈されるような行動はお控えいただくよう、お願いします」
languages.original_text: "If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."

traits.locale_text: 「もしチョーダ様が危ない状況に陥った場合、この区域のドームを爆発させる権限が与えられています。そうなれば、爆発による減圧が起きる。攻撃者は減圧中に破壊されますが、チョーダ様は王座のフィールドで守られるでしょう。攻撃行為と解釈されるような行動はお控えいただくよう、お願いします」
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: «Si milady se ve gravemente amenazada, estamos autorizados a detonar la cúpula de este sector. Al hacerlo se desencadenará una descompresión explosiva. Los atacantes serán destruidos durante la despresurización, mientras que milady estará protegida por el escudo proyectado por su trono. Ruego que tengan cuidado con cómo pueden interpretarse sus actos».
languages.original_text: "If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."

traits.locale_text: «Si milady se ve gravemente amenazada, estamos autorizados a detonar la cúpula de este sector. Al hacerlo se desencadenará una descompresión explosiva. Los atacantes serán destruidos durante la despresurización, mientras que milady estará protegida por el escudo proyectado por su trono. Ruego que tengan cuidado con cómo pueden interpretarse sus actos».
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: "Wenn ihre Ladyschaft ernsthaft bedroht wird, sind wir befugt, die Kuppel über diesem Sektor zum Einsturz zu bringen. Das hätte einen explosiven Druckabfall zur Folge. Die Angreifer werden durch den Druckabfall zerstört, während ihre Ladyschaft durch das Schutzfeld ihres Throns geschützt wird. Ich bitte Euch inständig, keine Schritte zu unternehmen, die als Akt der Aggression ausgelegt werden könnten."
languages.original_text: "If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ihre Ladyschaft ernsthaft bedroht wird, sind wir befugt, die Kuppel über diesem Sektor zum Einsturz zu bringen. Das hätte einen explosiven Druckabfall zur Folge. Die Angreifer werden durch den Druckabfall zerstört, während ihre Ladyschaft durch das Schutzfeld ihres Throns geschützt wird. Ich bitte Euch inständig, keine Schritte zu unternehmen, die als Akt der Aggression ausgelegt werden könnten."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: « Si Sa Seigneurie Chorda est menacée, nous sommes autorisés à faire exploser le dôme qui couvre ce secteur, ce qui entraînera une décompression massive anéantissant les attaquants. Sa Seigneurie, elle, restera à l'abri grâce au champ protégeant son trône. Je vous recommande donc d'éviter tout comportement pouvant être interprété comme un acte d'agression. »
languages.original_text: "If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."

traits.locale_text: « Si Sa Seigneurie Chorda est menacée, nous sommes autorisés à faire exploser le dôme qui couvre ce secteur, ce qui entraînera une décompression massive anéantissant les attaquants. Sa Seigneurie, elle, restera à l'abri grâce au champ protégeant son trône. Je vous recommande donc d'éviter tout comportement pouvant être interprété comme un acte d'agression. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: "Leydi Hazretleri'nın canı tehlikeye girerse bu sektörün üzerindeki kubbeyi patlatma yetkisine sahibiz. Bu işlem, ani bir basınç düşmesini tetikleyecek. Saldırganlar, basıncın azalmasıyla yok olurken Leydi Hazretleri ise tahtının sağladığı alan sayesinde korunacak. Saldırgan bir eylem olarak değerlendirilecek bir adım atmamanız konusunda ısrar ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "If Her Ladyship is gravely threatened, we are authorised to detonate the dome over this sector. Doing so will trigger an explosive decompression. The attackers will be destroyed during depressurisation while Her Ladyship will be protected by the field projected by her throne. I urge you not to take steps that might be interpreted as an act of aggression."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Hazretleri hayati tehlike altına girerse, bu sektörün üzerindeki kubbeyi patlatma yetkisine sahibiz. Bu işlem, ani bir basınç düşmesini tetikler. Saldırganlar basıncın azalmasıyla yok olur, Leydi Hazretleri ise tahtının sağladığı alan sayesinde korunur. Saldırgan bir eylem olarak değerlendirilecek bir adım atmamanız konusunda ısrar ediyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent
